content: st if you re one short just pick up a st from the corner onto either a 12 circular or dpns if you re facing the front of the balaclava starting at the upper left corner going down counter clockwise evenly pick up 6 st from the 6 row of stockinette at this point you ll be at the lower left corner transfer the 44 st that were on hold now you re at the lower right corner pick up 6 st from the 6 row of stockinette until you reach the upper right corner 96 st the path you ll be taking starts at the bottom right side of the face ribbing resuming the bottom pre-ribbed portion up the left side gusset across the crown and down the right gusset round 1 pm for beginning of round *p2 k2* repeat from * to * 9 more times you should be 4 st before picked up st p2 pm k9 k2tog pm **p2 k2** repeat from ** to ** 8 more times pm k2tog k7 94 st round 2 resume 2x2 rib until marker sm ssk k6 k2tog sm resume 2x2 rib until marker sm ssk k6 k2tog 90 st round 3 2x2 rib across top and bottom stockinette in gussets round 4 2x2 rib across top and bottom ssk k4 k2tog in gussets 86 st round 5 repeat round 3 round 6 2x2 rib across top and bottom ssk k2 k2tog in gussets 82 st round 7 repeat round 3 round 8 2x2 rib across top and bottom ssk k2tog in gussets 78 st round 9 repeat round 3 round 10 p2tog resume 2x2 rib until 2 st before marker ssptbl k2 across gusset p2tog resume 2x2 rib until 2 st before marker p2tog k2 across gusset 74 st round 11 knit around completely in pattern bind off you may want to switch to a size 8 for this break yarn weave in ends
